overview: Age may settle the restless spirit, but rest assured these young beauties are nowhere near that point in their lives. In fact, their minds are an unquestionable mish-mash of hormones and emotions; to which only the touch and taste of hard cock will bring sweet relief. Fortunately for them, there's a whole collection of other similarly-minded twinks in town that feel exactly the same way, and who can't wait to put their rampant dicks to good use - be it outside by the pool, on the sofa or in the bed. The result is a near-endless destruction of sweet, pert ass; not to mention a cascade of the hottest, freshest boy-batter!
title: Caught 'N Fucked
